revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Correcting proofread; date note; annotate Walt's letter
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
your letter is come this 1 of may May with the money all safe i received your letter also on tuesdayTuesday i was glad to hear you was so well then but sorry to hear you dont don't feel so well when you wrote this i want you to write just how you are whenever you write) i got a letter from Jeffy last monday Monday i think it was he writes they are all very well indeed he is to get quite a lift from his kansas Kansas work and he said it would come in very good for him i dont don't know what his expencesexpenses is but they seem to be very well satisfied at their boarding place he said mrMr. BucklyBuckley was coming on to new york New York in a short time and he would come back by the way of washington Washington and jeffJeff wanted me to write to you to ask if you couldent couldn't come on to st louLou is St. Louis with him
i dont don't suppose you could go any way so maybee maybe walterWalter dear you had better write to Jeff
i have not felt very well lately i am troubled very much lately with the dispepsy dyspepsia which makes me feel pretty bad we have lived quite poor lately as they thought georgeGeorge wouldent wouldn't get the boston Boston work but yesterday he got a letter from davisDavis giving him the work i dont don't know as it will make any difference but i doo do feel sometimes if i could have something except the regular fare i should like it as my appetite has been not very good but i beleive believe people cant can't change when they get in such ways of saving to hear the talk you would think they were very much put to it georgeGeorge has had work for mrMr. Lane he expects to get 6 dollars a day for it all and 8 a day for the new yorkNew York and he will get 5 per day for boston Boston but mrMr. Lanes work will be done before long i beleivebelieve)

i paid Lou the money for edds Edd's board she is better is around all the time now write as often as you can dear waltWalt the papers come on tuesday Tuesday all safe you dont don't get the graffick Graphic i suppose now
